headline: BOOM STAND
description: Microscope Boom Stand    Stands can be fitted for B&L StereoZoom Microscopes, Leica StereoZoom Microscopes, Nikon StereoZoom Microscopes, and Olympus StereoZoom Microscopes  Available only with purchase of a Stereozoom Microscope   E-arm not included
categories.lvl2: Microscopes  >  Microscope Parts and Accessories > Stands
specstable:
Model Microscope Boom Stand
Type Boom (Type S)
Other Information
  • Stands can be fitted for B&L StereoZoom Microscopes, Leica StereoZoom Microscopes, Nikon StereoZoom Microscopes, and Olympus StereoZoom Microscopes.
    Check our inventory for availability
  • E-arm not included. Check our inventory for availability

    Stand includes: Base, vertical post, knuckle, memory ring, and horizontal post
    Dimensions:
    Base- 8.75" x 8.75" x 2.25"
    Vertical post- 15"
    Horizontal post- 15"

Exterior Dimensions
Height 17.250 in (43.8 cm)
